events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further consideration based on your software development experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will reach out to you soon to discuss the next steps in the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, and your technical skills appear well suited to our engineering team.
Thank you for your prompt response and interest; you confirmed your availability for the upcoming technical interview this week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM UTC with one of our lead engineers.
You successfully completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong programming skills along with problem-solving abilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC to further discuss cultural fit and company values.
Your HR interview was completed positively, and the team was impressed with your communication skills and alignment with our values.
We are pleased to propose you an official employment offer for the Software Engineer position with our company.
Thank you for your feedback; you have reviewed the offer and expressed enthusiasm to join our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you as a new Software Engineer on board.
Your onboarding process has started, including account setup, orientation sessions, and team introductions.
The hiring process is now officially closed as you have joined the company and settled into your new role successfully.
